comments:
Install eclipse profiler plugin and try to create a launch configuration.
First we get Unhandled event loop exception
Second we get the main error
org/eclipse/jdt/internal/debug/ui/launcher/JavaLaunchConfigurationTab

This profile plug-in is not part of the SDK and appears to use classes that are no longer in the sdk. please open a bug against whoever supplies that plug-in.
